Request.Command: set nonomatch umask 002 echo %DATE%_%TIME% > $WORKDIR/timeStamp echo "User: " `whoami` echo "Groups: " `groups` echo "WORKDIR: " $WORKDIR echo "PWD: " $PWD setenv QWSCRATCH %QWSCRATCH% setenv QWANALYSIS %QWANALYSIS% echo "QWSCRATCH: " $QWSCRATCH echo "QWANALYSIS: " $QWANALYSIS source $QWANALYSIS/SetupFiles/SET_ME_UP.csh setenv QW_DATA $WORKDIR setenv QW_ROOTFILES $WORKDIR echo "QW_DATA: " $QW_DATA echo "QW_ROOTFILES: " $QW_ROOTFILES echo "------" echo "Started at `date`" echo \ $QWANALYSIS/Extensions/Tracking/macros/process_run.sh --pass=%PASS% --run=%RUN% --macros=%MACROS% %OTHER% $QWANALYSIS/Extensions/Tracking/macros/process_run.sh --pass=%PASS% --run=%RUN% --macros=%MACROS% %OTHER% echo "Finished at `date`"
